value.excerpt: I will show you how you can find a Power BI Job in 3 genuine steps. These steps are simple and straight-forward. But not necessarily easy. value.title: How to Manage a Global Supply Chain with Power BI üî¥Talk Power BI LIVE (Subscribe & Join)
value.excerpt: Business is increasingly global, with supply chain crossing multiple vendors across country and continents.  Can Power BI help you manage the global Supply Chain? How can it make you more efficient? More resilient? Save you money? Find out in this special session with our guest: Christian Osborn https://www.linkedin.com/in/christianosborn/

value.title: Power BI Financial Dashboard: Frequency x Reach x Yield = Revenue (The F.R.Y. approach)
value.excerpt: Let's do something unique for building a Financial Dashboard using Power BI. We would use the F.R.Y. approach (Frequency, Reach, Yield) to analyze our revenue numbers.  You can also use the F.R.Y. approach to analyze any other performance metric. Leave a comment and let me know how it went for you?
